title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the Seahawks regressing without Russell Wilson is further proof the superstar quarterback could be ready to leave Seattle as his relationship with head coach Pete Carroll deteriorates. He shoots down the rumors about Mike Tomlin leaving the Steelers and the NFL for the USC head coaching position. He also reveals his Herd Hierarchy after week 7 of the NFL season. Plus, Hall of Famer Jerome Bettis joins the show to tell join why Aaron Rodgers joining the Steelers next season makes a lot of sense. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
